Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Responsible for representing a single hotel.

  • Method Details

    • generateRooms

      public void generateRooms(int option, int noOfRooms, int start)
      Algorithm for generating the room number system that follows the following pattern:

      A01, A02, ..., A10, B01, ..., E01, ... E10

      Parameters:
      option - - kind of room to generate, 1 is Standard, 2 is Deluxe, 3 is Executive
      noOfRooms - - the number of rooms to be generated
      start - - the starting value, corresponds to the number for the room that will directly be generated next

    • getName

      public String getName()
      returns the value of the name of the hotel
      Returns:
      this.name

    • getNoOfRooms

      public int getNoOfRooms()
      returns the value of the number of rooms in the hotel
      Returns:
      this.roomList.size()

    • getReservationCount

      public int getReservationCount()
      returns the number of reservations made in the hotel
      Returns:
      this.reservationList.size()

    • getRoomList

      public ArrayList<Room> getRoomList()
      returns the Room ArrayList roomList
      Returns:
      this.roomList

    • getReservationList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList()
      returns the Reservation ArrayList reservation
      Returns:
      this.reservationList

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(float newPrice)
      sets the price of all rooms in a hotel to a given value
      Parameters:
      newPrice - - the new price to be set for every room in the hotel

    • setBasePrice

      public void setBasePrice(float newBasePrice)
      sets the base price parameter
      Parameters:
      newBasePrice - represents the new base price of the hotel

    • simulateBooking

      public void simulateBooking(int roomNo, int checkIn, int checkOut, String guestName, String discountCode)
      Shows the user the list of available rooms and asks the user for all necessary information to create a booking (the room name and/or number, guest name, check-in, and check-out day).
      Parameters:
      roomNo - - integer that represents a room number (does not follow naming convention, so B01 would be 11)
      checkIn - - the day the guest will check-in to their hotel room
      checkOut - - the day the guest will check-out
      guestName - - name of the guest reserving a hotel room
      discountCode - - string containing the possibly valid discount code

    • getRoomNo

      public int getRoomNo(String roomName)
      returns the index value of a room when given its name.
      Parameters:
      roomName - - the unique string identifier of a room (e.g. A01)
      Returns:
      the index value of the hotel room or -1 when the given room name does not exist

    • getTotalRevenue

      public float getTotalRevenue()
      returns the total amount of revenue made through reservations
      Returns:
      a float value that represents the amount of money a hotel has made throughout the entire month

    • getReservedRoomCount

      public int getReservedRoomCount(int date)
      function counts the amount of rooms that are unavailable on a certain date
      Parameters:
      date - is the date of which the program will check every room's availability
      Returns:
      an integer value that represents the amount of rooms that are reserved on the given date

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)
      Sets the name of a hotel to a given new one.
      Parameters:
      newName - - the new name of the hotel

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(int option, int num)
      Adds rooms to the hotel given an option and number
      Parameters:
      option - - option for what kind of room to generate (Standard, Deluxe, or Executive)
      num - - number of rooms to be generated

    • setDatePriceModifier

      public void setDatePriceModifier(int date, float modifier)
      Changes the value for the date price modifier given a date
      Parameters:
      date - - date to changed
      modifier - - the new modifier to be applied

    • getDatePriceModifier

      public float getDatePriceModifier(int date)
      Returns the value for the date price modifier given a date
      Parameters:
      date - - date to be returned
      Returns:
      date a floating point value that represents the date price modifier
